title: ISic000120. I.Sicily inscription 000120
body:
Facsimile Images

D(is) ((ivy-leaf)) m(anibus)
Acilia ((ivy-leaf)) M(arci) f(ilia) Cris-
pina ((ivy-leaf)) v(ixit) ((ivy-leaf)) a(nnis) ((ivy-leaf)) II ((ivy-leaf))
m(ensibus) ((ivy-leaf)) VII ((ivy-leaf)) d(iebus) XV

Apparatus criticus

Text of Gualtherus

Latin translation

To the Shades of the underworld. Acilia Crispina, daughter of Marcus, lived two years, seven months and fifteen days.

commentary
